comment.author: 8420103@N05
comment._content: Fabulous shot. Loads of movement in a still. Must have been taken before they caged in the top of the pillar completely. This from the top of the Pillar looking North. Note all the cars parked up the centre of the street and the shadow of the Pillar like a sundial. My camera at that time wasn't great so the quality is poor. Still it's a view you can't get at all now unless you're cleaning the Spire! This is an unusual view of Liberty Hall. Note the full gasometer. And this of the Pro Cathedral and Department of Education.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/photopol] Where were you when you took the Liberty Hall photo?
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
